author: Belinda Ang Saw Ean JAD:
casenumber: High Court — Originating Summons No 683 of 2018
casename: BTN and another v BTP and another
counsel: Yeo Khirn Hai Alvin SC, Koh Swee Yen, Low Sze Hui, Jasmine (Liu Sihui) and Quek Yi Zhi, Joel (Guo Yizhi) (Wongpartnership LLP) for the plaintiffs; Chew Kei-jin, Tan Silin, Stephanie (Chen Silin), Yeo Chuan Tat (Yang Quanda) and Tyne Lam (Ascendant Legal LLC) for the defendants.

headings.text: Whether costs should be on a standard or indemnity basis in failed applications to set aside an arbitral award
Decision on quantum of costs for OS 683
